name: The Last Moments of a Doomed Spaceship
name_original: The Last Moments of a Doomed Spaceship
description:
The Last Moments of a Doomed Spaceship

As we all know, the final battle of the First Solar Conflict ended in defeat for the forces of the Unified Solar Peoples; it would be many years before the tyrannical rule of the New Earth Hegemony would be overthrown.

The carrier ship USPV Seagrove was the last remaining capital ship in the USP fleet. This a log of the final moments prior to its inevitable destruction.
